name: UIButton.ButtonType
desc: Specifies the style of a button.

items.name: case system
items.desc: A system style button, such as those shown in navigation bars and toolbars.

items.name: case infoLight
items.desc: An information button that has a light background.

items.name: case infoDark
items.desc: An information button that has a dark background.

items.name: case plain
items.desc: A standard system button without a blurred background view.

items.name: case close
items.desc: A close button to dismiss panels and views.
